alert.note: Alert for Harmon; Jackson (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 04 at 1:55PM CDT until October 04 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN JACKSON...SOUTHEASTERN HARMON...NORTHWESTERN WILBARGER AND EAST CENTRAL HARDEMAN COUNTIES... At 155 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles southwest of Eldorado, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Eldorado and Odell. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
